AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: drudgery worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born as a worker under the queen, [PAWN_nameDef] will likely never live to do anything but be that which many will trade for; someone more than capable of dumb labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: royal attendant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tireless servant responsible for the caring, cleaning and feeding of the queen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: disgraced guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked to protect [PAWN_possessive] queen from danger, but fell from grace after an embarrassing incident involving a pineapple. \nStripped of [PAWN_possessive] position and ashamed, every time [PAWN_nameDef] looks upon a piece of fruit they are reminded of [PAWN_possessive] failure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: apini scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The long periods spent out of the hive has made [PAWN_nameDef] a resilient individual, well suited to reconnaissance and vanguard work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: undertaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for disposing of corpses outside of the hive. This was a thankless yet vital job, lest the dead bodies attract predators.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: honeycomb architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Responsible for secreting wax and building the honeycombs, [PAWN_nameDef] would spend most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing exactly that, and only that. Unfortunately, [PAWN_possessive] constant business has left them with little time for socialization or other skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: pollen gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an agricultural buff, rather common amongst the Apini. Pollen gathering is an essential job, for without honey the hive will starve through winter

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hiveless
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is without a hive, and without a home. Displaced they had to learn to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own. Yet [PAWN_nameDef] also discovered the beauty in everything around them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: buzz artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an entrepreneur in what humans called confectionery. They have experimented in making many tasty honey based creations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: busybody
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always works tirelessly and hastily to expand and decorate the hive. They have to do their job so fast that they never had time to look into the sky.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wasp wannabee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: “Bee’s are, like totally boring”, “I wish mom hadn’t been a fat slob who killed dad”, “It’s not a phase, guys! Whatever, I’m going with the Hornets” are many a phrase [PAWN_nameDef] utter in adolescence. \n [PAWN_nameDef] stuck by these thoughts for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life, finding [PAWN_possessive]self outcast for [PAWN_possessive]… alternative thinking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: veteran soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Dangerous and lethal, [PAWN_nameDef] is likely the definition of “nope” in many galactic textbooks. However they have a softer side, dutifully tending [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers on the battlefield.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: pollen-tician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A recent position, made out of spite of the traditional monarchy, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a pollen-tician, much to the despair of [PAWN_possessive] community

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: b-lazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] likes fire. They like it a lot. Where most avoid the smoke and heat, [PAWN_nameDef] is drawn to the substance, seeing it as a way of expressing [PAWN_possessive] lust for power and individual freedom.\n By Apini standards, they are the equivalent of the most despicable human sociopath.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: layabout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In search of an easy life, [PAWN_nameDef] spent the entire time avoiding the hard work on the hive, so much that one day they was noticed and banned.\n They lived the rest of time in a improvised house bothering anyone they meet to get any easy job.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: nanny
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the young of the hive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: caravaneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went out often and traded goods from the hive. They became good at negotiating with others and handling the animals, but weren't taught much in the way of menial skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: alpaca shepherd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a fascination with fluffy alpaca, curiosity turned into an unhealthy obsession and after a rather embarrassing incident, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of the colony.\nOut to start anew, bringing with them [PAWN_possessive] love for the fluffiest of creatures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hive protector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with guarding the hive against azuri swarms. [PAWN_nameDef] had to rely on other apini to make sure they stayed supplied so [PAWN_nameDef] could dedicate all [PAWN_possessive] time to [PAWN_possessive] vigilance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: wax sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always felt using wax for petty things like 'walls' and 'floors' was a great waste of beesources. Due to this, [PAWN_nameDef] begun to capture beeutiful bee figures and craft unbeleevably opulent wares.\nUnfortunately, much to [PAWN_possessive] hive's disdain and concern, [PAWN_nameDef] became something of a recluse and a wax thief. [PAWN_possessive] beehavior was reluctantly tolerated by the rest of the hive - if only because of the art's value to exotic trade.
